page.title: 18A Police Station
page.content: { TWO, 10 YEAR OLD CHILDREN, REPORT: There are 88 people,including nine women, at Stanley Road station, which covers 1/3 of the city. Boundaries are St Domingo Rd,Boundary St & Bedford Rd {There are 4 patrol cars and a few {kennels but horses for crowd control {are stabled in other parts of the city The most important thing a policeman carries is a radio because it makes it easier to communicate with other police who are on the beat. {They use planned policing now where {they look for problems and try to {prevent crimes from happening. The computer is a vital ingredient in modern policing for the storing and easy access of information. {The pager enables the superintendant {to be contacted by bleep anytime, {anywhere in an emergency. The most {common crimes are car theft & burglary
